timeline.bodyText: "data-hub-match-merge-writer" already has "data-hub-common-writer". So, this can be removed.
timeline.author: srinathgit
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,10 @@
+{
+  "role-name": "hub-central-match-merge-writer",
+  "description": "Permits reading/reviewing matching and merging steps in Hub Central",
+  "role": [
+    "hub-central-match-merge-reader",
+    "data-hub-common-writer",

timeline.bodyText: Also "data-hub-mapping-writer" and "data-hub-ingestion-writer" have "data-hub-step-definition-reader" . So, should this ("data-hub-step-definition-reader") be moved to "data-hub-match-merge-writer" ?
timeline.author: srinathgit
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,10 @@
+{
+  "role-name": "hub-central-match-merge-writer",
+  "description": "Permits reading/reviewing matching and merging steps in Hub Central",
+  "role": [
+    "hub-central-match-merge-reader",
+    "data-hub-common-writer",
+    "data-hub-match-merge-writer",
+    "data-hub-step-definition-reader"

replies.bodyText: Good catch. I think it would make more sense on the "data-hub-match-merge-writer". The "data-hub-step-definition-reader" is needed to read the step definition at the time it is saved.
replies.author: ryanjdew

timeline.message:
DHFPROD-4675: Create hub-central-match-merge-reader-role

also DHFPROD-4676: Create hub-central-match-merge-writer role
